misson:
{
  "Mission": {
    "name": "Agricultural_Surveillance",
    "param": [
      25,
      [
        [0, 0, 0],
        [0, 10, -5],
        [10, 10, -5],
        [10, 0, -5],
        [0, 0, -5]
      ]
    ]
  }
}

This JSON object represents a drone mission named "Agricultural_Surveillance" with a velocity of 25 meters per second. The drone will fly to five waypoints, forming a square pattern in the Cartesian coordinate system. The waypoints are:

1) [0, 0, 0] - Starting point
2) [0, 10, -5] - Move 10 meters upward and 10 meters to the right
3) [10, 10, -5] - Move 10 meters to the right
4) [10, 0, -5] - Move 10 meters downward
5) [0, 0, -5] - Move 10 meters to the left, returning to the starting point
